quest_desc.qdesc: 향긋한 와인맛 우유(300137), 발효된 나무 열매(300129)

talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

$Warehouse Keeper Rupert$
I am kinda of busy right now, do not disturb.
(Talk to Argenta in the Gray Ruins to start this quest.)

$Merchant May$
Yes? You have something for me?
(Talk to Argenta in the Gray Ruins to start this quest.)

$Heraldry Scholar Bailey$
If you want to know more about the Heraldry, you can come to me.
(Talk to Argenta in the Gray Ruins to start this quest.)

$Kevin$
I want to be the pilot of the airship! But... for now I can't.
(Talk to Argenta in the Gray Ruins to start this quest.)

$Argenta$
I'm hungry.

$Argenta$
Um, that would be good
Yeah I want to eat that! Yes!

$Argenta$
You know, the milk everyone was crazy about a while ago.
The tasty wine-flavoured milk.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html> (... I am not very curious actually ...) </html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
Tsk tsk. You don't know a lot of things.
The greatest poet of our times, the legendary William Bleah teared up and left this comment after drinking the tasty wine milk:

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>So... where can I get it from?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Poet William Bleah$
Ah... This makes me think of lines for a poem!
I was angry with the goblin: I told my wrath, and he gave me the wine-flavoured milk. I was angry with the orc: I told it not, and he also gave me the wine-flavoured milk.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Perhaps the general store might have it...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
I don't know. Isn't it sold in shops?
Isn't there a shop over there where the humans live?

$Argenta$
Why not try asking Merchant May? She might have some idea.
<html>$Argenta's Milk$ </html>

$Argenta$
Get moving, I'm hungry..
(Argenta looks bored and turns away)

$Argenta$
I'm hungry

$Argenta$
Um, that would be good
Yeah I want to eat that! Yes!

$Argenta$
You know, the milk everyone was crazy about a while ago.
The tasty wine-flavoured milk.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html> (... I am not very curious actually ...) </html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
Tsk tsk. You don't know a lot of things.
The greatest poet of our times, the legendary William Bleah teared up and left this comment after drinking the tasty wine milk:

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>So... where can I get it from?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Poet William Bleah$
Ah... This makes me think of lines for a poem!
I was angry with the goblin: I told my wrath, and he gave me the wine-flavoured milk. I was angry with the orc: I told it not, and he also gave me the wine-flavoured milk.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Perhaps the general store might have it...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
I don't know. Isn't it sold in shops?
Isn't there a shop over there where the humans live?

$Argenta$
Why not try asking Merchant May? She might have some idea.

$Merchant May$
Yes? What do you need?
(Talk to Argenta in the Gray Ruins.)

$Heraldry Scholar Bailey$
Anytime you want to chat about heraldry, jewels, or plates, I'm your man!
(Talk to Argenta in the Gray Ruins.)

$Kevin$
Sorry, the airship is not ready for boarding yet.
(Talk to Argenta in the Gray Ruins.)

$Warehouse Keeper Rupert$
Do you need help in storing stuff? I will be glad to be at your assistance.
(Talk to Argenta in the Gray Ruins.)

$Argenta$
Haven't I told you, I'm hungry.
(Argenta turns away, ignoring you.)

$Merchant May$
Good stuff are hard to find these day, not that I don't want to sell.

$Merchant May$
Wine-flavoured milk... Ah! That! Wait, let me check the recipe book.
(May begins rummaging through the old chest of drawers.)
Ah, here it is!

$Merchant May$
Hmm.. wine-flavoured milk... It was popular but that was 50 years ago. You won't be able to find it now. But you are lucky that I still have the recipe.
(May happily shows you the recipe book)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>So.. Any idea where I can get them?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Merchant May$
Let me see.. Seems like I have all the ingredients except one. I need a couple of Fermented Herbs.

$Merchant May$
I used to get them delivered, but the delivery wagon was attacked and stolen by the monsters. The Kobolds at Raider's Ambush Point stole them because they like sweet stuff. Do you think you can get them back?

$Warehouse Keeper Rupert$
Do you need help in storing stuff? I'd be happy to help you..
(Talk to Merchant May.)

$Heraldry Scholar Bailey$
Talk to be anytime if you want to know more about heraldry, jewels or plates!
(Talk to Merchant May.)

$Kevin$
Sorry, the airship is not ready for boarding yet.
(Talk to Merchant May.

$Merchant May$
I think 5 Fermented Herbs will be more than enough. Meanwhile I will work on the rest of the ingredients.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(You pass them over to Merchant May.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Merchant May$
Did you bring the Fermented Herbs?

$Merchant May$
It's almost ready. Now for the final ingredient...
(May tosses them into a huge pot.)

$Merchant May$
This is my first try at making this so I might have made it a little too much.
There are many ingredients for this you know… Haha…

$Merchant May$
Since I am feeling generous today, I'm thinking of sharing the extra wine-flavoured milk with the rest of the people in Calderock. Can you help with the delivery?
I will give you a lot of this tasty wine-flavoured milk for free in return!

$Merchant May$
Thank you so much! Okay first on list is Warehouse Keeper Rupert, then some to Heraldry Scholar Bailey, and last but not least, Kevin. Only these 3. Thanks!

$Merchant May$
Deliver this first batch of wine-flavoured milk to Warehouse Keeper Rupert.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(You explain him it's a gift from Merchant May.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Warehouse Keeper Rupert$
Oh what is that? It doesn't look like it can be stored here.

$Warehouse Keeper Rupert$
Ah! It's from May? Just in time, I was feeling thirsty. Thank May for me.

$Warehouse Keeper Rupert$
Remember to look for me if you need any storage service.
(Head to Heraldry Scholar Bailey next.)

$Merchant May$
Deliver some of my wine milk to Heraldry Scholar Bailey next, please.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(You explain him it's a gift from Merchant May.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Heraldry Scholar Bailey$
Do you have something to ask me?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I heard that it was popular not so long ago.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Heraldry Scholar Bailey${action:Talk}
What? May made this? I'm surprised.
How does she know such an old drink's recipe.

$Heraldry Scholar Bailey$
Can't be.
My grandmother used to like this when she was still young.
It was popular about 50 years ago.

$Heraldry Scholar Bailey$
Ah! This drink brought back memories of my grandma.. Please thank May for me.
(Talk to Kevin next.)

$Heraldry Scholar Bailey$
Do let me know if you need any storage service.
(Head to Heraldry Scholar Bailey next.)

$Heraldry Scholar Bailey$
Ah! This drink brought back memories of my grandma.. Please thank May for me.
(Talk to Kevin next.)

$Merchant May$
Last on the list... Would you please deliver this to Kevin?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(You explain him it's a gift from Merchant May.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Kevin$
Sorry, no boarding is allowed.
What? You're here for something else?

$Kevin$
Doesn't this contain alcohol? Airship crew are not allowed to drink while on duty.
(He sniffs the drink.) .
…Wait a minute. This is milk!
(Kevin's eyes are sparkling)

$Kevin$
Yummy! Super delicious! It'd be much better if we could drink this on board the airship.

$Kevin$
All thanks to you, this airship can fly again! I heard stories about you from Airship Engineer Hubert.
(Kevin seems excited)

$Kevin$
Wow~ Cool!! Am I going to be a real crew now?!! I'm going to be the proud crew of theNautilus!! Heheh!!

$Kevin$
Maybe May can try selling this milk to the airship guests. I am sure it will sell well! I'll let her know about that the next time we meet.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I'm sure the airship will be repaired in no time...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Kevin$
I thought Nautilus would have been ready to take off by now. Airship Engineer Hubert just wouldn't tell me what the problem is.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Kevin is excited about his long-awaited dream) </html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Kevin$
Maybe May can try selling this milk to the airship guests. I am sure it will sell well! I'll let her know about that the next time we meet.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I'm sure the airship will be repaired in no time...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Kevin$
I've been waiting to fly since... ages ago. Uncle Hubert told me that he found someone to help in the search for the missing airship parts.

$Kevin$
Maybe May can try selling this milk to the airship guests. I am sure it will sell well! I'll let her know about that the next time we meet.

$Kevin$
Oh! I almost forget. Please let May that I love the milk!

$Kevin$
It kind of smelled like my grandmother at first, but the more I drink, the more tasty it gets! It will sell quite well!

$Kevin$
Oh! I almost forget. Please let May that I love the milk! It kind of smelled like my grandmother at first, but the more I drink, the more tasty it gets! It will sell quite well!

$Merchant May$
Wow are you done with the deliveries? You're so quick!
How did everyone find the milk?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html> Hundred years is a little too….</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Merchant may$
That's a relief. This recipe book might prove to be quite useful.
Indeed, vintage is the new in-thing! Ten years is not enough, it should be at least fifty years old!! Hundred years old!!!

$Merchant May$
I'm going to recreate these recipes and expand my menu list.
Oh! I almost forgot, these leftover wine-flavoured milk is for you.

$Merchant May$
Bye! See you again

$Argenta$
What took you so long?
It was just buying the milk from that merchant girl!!
Don't tell me you drank up all my milk on your way back?!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html> This drink was only popular 50 years ago… They don't sell this anymore now.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
Yeah…I understand that it is quite popular so it may have been sold out..

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>It's not a while ago but long ago...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
Yeah I know. 50 years ago. What's wrong with that?

$Argenta$
If 50 years is considered long, what about 500? Or even 5000 years ago?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html> (Argenta finish all the milk in a split second) </html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
You took so long and all you got is just these few bottle?
(*Gulp*)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#2b2723>(She drank ten bottles and she says it was not enough…!!)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
Thanks, even though this wasn't enough to satisfy me. Now, slave {user_nick}, take this!
<html>$Quest Reward$</html>

$Argenta$
Ah... Now that I remember...
You better come back often, don't be lazy. Heard that?!

journal.title: Argenta's hunger
journal.contents:
Argenta has a craving for wine-flavoured milk. You might be able to get some from Merchant May.

Calderock Village → Merchant May

journal.title: Merchant May's Recipes
journal.contents:
Merchant May needs Fermented Herbs to make the drink. Go to the Raider's Ambush Point and retrieve those stolen goods from the Kobolds.

Cristal Stream (Raider's Den Entrance)→ Raider's Ambush Point
journal.todo_msg: Hunt down Kobolds at Raider's Ambush Point.

journal.title: Completed collecting materials
journal.contents:
You have completed collecting the Fermented Herbs. Return to Merchant May at Calderock Village and ask her to make the milk Argenta wants.

Calderock Village → Merchant May
journal.todo_msg: Talk to Merchant May at Calderock Village.

journal.title: Delivery Request from Merchant May
journal.contents:
Merchant May successfully made the wine-flavoured milk. She'll give you some for free if you make some deliveries for her. Give some to Warehouse Keeper Rupert.

Calderock Village → Warehouse Keeper Rupert
journal.todo_msg: Deliver wine-flavoured milk to Warehouse Keeper Rupert

journal.title: Delivery Request from Merchant May II
journal.contents:
Merchant May successfully made the wine-flavoured milk. She'll give you some for free if you make deliveries for her. Deliver some to Heraldry Scholar Bailey.

Calderock Village → Heraldry Scholar Bailey
journal.todo_msg: Deliver the wine-flavoured milk to Heraldry Scholar Bailey

journal.title: Delivery Request from Merchant May III
journal.contents:
It seems like the craze over wine-flavoured milk has already passed long time ago. Get rid of the stock by giving some to Kevin.

Calderock Village → Kevin

journal.title: Merchant May Delivery Mission Complete
journal.contents:
You have completed delivering wine-flavoured milk. Now, go back and talk to Merchant May.

Calerock Village → Merchant May
journal.todo_msg: Deliveries complete! Report back to Merchant May.

journal.title: Argenta's Milk
journal.contents:
You've obtained wine-flavoured milk from Merchant May. Now deliver the milk to Argenta in the Gray Ruins.

Gray Ruins → Argenta
journal.destination: Talk to Argenta at the Gray Ruins
